name: Power Of Slide (Demo)
description:
POWER OF SLIDE is gymkhana drifting game inspired by Ken Block's GYMKHANA video series.

Try to learn how to drift in a limited space, perform spins and tricks.

A set of tasks at each level will not let you get bored, but you will have to work hard to collect all the stars. (Only the first tutorial level is available in the demo)

Follow Twitter
